description:
A collection of Active Directory Tools to streamline Active Directory

Active Directory Pro Toolkit is an easy to use Active Directory Tools that makes managing Active Directory fast, easy and efficient. Automate tasks that are consuming your time and resources.
- Fixed: Scheduled reports would not save to a mapped drive. This has been resolved.
- Fixed: The user management page will auto update when making changes to an account.
- Fixed: User templates will display in alphabetic order.
